response.overview: 2003 Tokyo Autosalon Special: "The MECCA" for Japan car lovers. Check out the newest product, race cars and race queens! Evolution JDM Conversion: Darryl couldnt wait for the EVD to come to America, so he built one himself! Volk Racing Wheel Tech: Mike and Mackin Industries explain everything you need to know about aftermarket wheels! Alex Pfieffer Interview: Renowned American drifter Alex Pfieffer at Willow Springs! Import Revolution: GRIP introduces you to the import lifestyle in Honolulu, Hawaii! Daikoku Futo: Legendary Japan racer cruise spot! Japan Freeway Racing: Late night street racing on the WANGAN Expressway with a Top End NSX and Porsche 964 going more than 260 km/h! SP Engineering Supra-7: SP Engineerings Supra-7 is a NUTS conversion, throwing a 2JZ Supra engine in an FD35 RX-7 is INSANE!
response.tagline: Covering the Import Auto Show and race scene, Grip delivers hard hitting action, technical features, and product showcases.
response.title: Grip Video Volume 3
